title: A quinoxalineâ€“benzothiadiazole heterotrimer for organic solar cells with extraordinary efficiency and stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00860J, Paper
Jinfeng Liu, Xiaopeng Duan, Jiali Song, Chunhui Liu, Jiaxin Gao, Min Hun Jee, Zheng Tang, Han Young Woo, Yanming Sun
A new hybrid strategy synthesizes the TQT acceptor with thiadiazole and quinoxaline units. The resulting TQT-based OSC achieved 18.52% efficiency, topping linear trimer acceptor-based OSCs, while also exhibiting robust stability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
